revised_title: Obituary of Sir William Huggins: Pioneering Astrophysicist
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir William Huggins, a past President and distinguished Fellow of the Royal Society. Huggins was a pioneer in the field of astrophysics, applying the spectroscope to the analysis of starlight and making important discoveries in the field. His work laid the foundation for modern astrophysics and expanded our understanding of the composition of stars, including the sun.
